F

firePentadShot(Direction) - Method in interface battlecode.common.RobotController
Fires a five bullets with the center bullet in the direction dir and with a spread of GameConstants.PENTAD_SPREAD_DEGREES degrees for the other bullets.
fireSingleShot(Direction) - Method in interface battlecode.common.RobotController
Fires a single bullet in the direction dir at the cost of GameConstants.SINGLE_SHOT_COST from your team's bullet supply.
fireTriadShot(Direction) - Method in interface battlecode.common.RobotController
Fires a three bullets with the center bullet in the direction dir and with a spread of GameConstants.TRIAD_SPREAD_DEGREES degrees for the other bullets.
